summary: A configuration container that encapsulates all architectural and regularization hyperparameters needed to construct the vision encoder of an ALIGN model, mirroring EfficientNet‑B7 defaults while allowing customization of input channels, image size, scaling coefficients, kernel sizes, channel dimensions, strides, block repetitions, activation functions, pooling type, initialization, batch‑norm settings, and drop‑connect rates.
business_intent: Enable developers to define, reproduce, and share the exact vision encoder architecture for ALIGN models through a single, serializable config object, simplifying model instantiation, fine‑tuning, and integration with pretrained checkpoints.
